column1: 2 Large Containers of Disinfectant Wipes (Clorox or Lysol works best)
1 plastic folder with pockets and prongs (green),
1 package of wide ruled loose leaf paper
No. 2 Yellow PRESHARPENED PENCILS (2 packages of 24)
1 bottle of glue and 1 glue stick
School pouch large enough for crayons, scissors, glue, and pencils (NO BOX)
